description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人。现任中华人民共和国国务委员、国务院秘书长、国务院机关党组书记。曾任江苏省省长、中共江苏省委书记等职务。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, currently holding a vice-national level leadership position. He serves as a State Councilor, Secretary-General of the State Council, and Secretary of the Party Leadership Group of the State Council Organ. He previously served as Governor of Jiangsu and Secretary of the CPC Jiangsu Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山西省太原市的一所大学，吴政隆于1984年毕业于其前身太原机械学院。
description.en: A university located in Taiyuan, Shanxi Province, China. Wu Zhenglong graduated from its predecessor, Taiyuan Institute of Machinery, in 1984.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任机械工业部部长、国家发展计划委员会副主任、重庆市市长。吴政隆曾担任其秘书。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Minister of Machine-Building Industry, Vice Chairman of the State Development Planning Commission, and Mayor of Chongqing. Wu Zhenglong once served as his secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的一个部门。
description.en: A former ministry of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 重庆市的省级行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level administrative organ of Chongqing.

nodes.id: 中国共产党万州区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党万州区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在重庆市万州区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Wanzhou District, Chongqing.

nodes.id: 重庆市万州区人民政府

zh-cn: 重庆市万州区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 重庆市万州区的行政机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Wanzhou District, Chongqing.

nodes.id: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在重庆市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Chongqing.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会选举产生的中央委员会。
description.en: The Central Committee elected by the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共太原市委书记，后因腐败问题落马。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Party Secretary of Taiyuan and was later dismissed due to corruption.

nodes.id: 中国共产党山西省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党山西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山西省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shanxi Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党太原市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党太原市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在太原市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Taiyuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，吴政隆的前任中共南京市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Wu Zhenglong as the Party Secretary of Nanjing.

nodes.id: 中国共产党江苏省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党江苏省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江苏省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Jiangsu Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党南京市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党南京市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在南京市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 江苏省的省级行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level administrative organ of Jiangsu.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会选举产生的中央委员会。
description.en: The Central Committee elected by the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 江苏省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 江苏省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 江苏省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing committee of the Jiangsu Provincial People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会选举产生的中央委员会。
description.en: The Central Committee elected by the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，吴政隆的继任中共江苏省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor to Wu Zhenglong as the Party Secretary of Jiangsu.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务委员

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务委员

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成人员，是国家级副职领导人。
description.en: A member of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, a vice-national level leader.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院秘书长

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院秘书长

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成人员，负责处理国务院的日常工作。
description.en: A member of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for handling the daily work of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任国务院总理。吴政隆是其在国务院的秘书长，此前吴政隆也曾在李强担任中共江苏省委书记期间担任江苏省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Premier of the State Council. Wu Zhenglong serves as his Secretary-General in the State Council, and previously served as Governor of Jiangsu while Li Qiang was the Party Secretary of Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，吴政隆的前任中共江苏省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Wu Zhenglong as the Party Secretary of Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾在吴政隆担任中共江苏省委书记时任副书记兼省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Deputy Secretary and Governor when Wu Zhenglong was the Party Secretary of Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾在吴政隆担任中共太原市委书记时任副书记兼市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Deputy Secretary and Mayor when Wu Zhenglong was the Party Secretary of Taiyuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾在吴政隆担任中共南京市委书记时任副书记兼市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Deputy Secretary and Mayor when Wu Zhenglong was the Party Secretary of Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，吴政隆的前任江苏省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Wu Zhenglong as Governor of Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，吴政隆的前任国务院秘书长。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Wu Zhenglong as Secretary-General of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 1984年8月毕业于太原机械学院（现中北大学）机械制造工艺与设备专业。
description.en: Graduated in August 1984 from Taiyuan Institute of Machinery (now North University of China) with a major in Mechanical Manufacturing Technology and Equipment.

description.zh-cn: 于1987年11月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in November 1987.

description.zh-cn: 曾在机械工业部和国家发展计划委员会担任时任部长、副主任包叙定的秘书。
description.en: Served as secretary to then-Minister and Vice Chairman Bao Xuding in the Ministry of Machine-Building Industry and the State Development Planning Commission.

description.zh-cn: 伴随包叙定从国家发展计划委员会调任重庆市，吴政隆也于1999年12月调任重庆市政府办公厅副主任。
description.en: Following Bao Xuding's transfer from the State Development Planning Commission to Chongqing, Wu Zhenglong was also transferred in December 1999 to serve as Deputy Director of the General Office of the Chongqing Municipal Government.

relationships.target: 重庆市万州区人民政府
中国共产党万州区委员会
中国共产党重庆市委员会
中国共产党第十八届中央委员会
中国共产党太原市委员会

description.zh-cn: 在吴政隆担任中共太原市委书记期间，耿彦波任太原市市长。
description.en: While Wu Zhenglong was the Party Secretary of Taiyuan, Geng Yanbo served as the Mayor of Taiyuan.

relationships.target: 中国共产党南京市委员会

description.zh-cn: 在吴政隆担任中共南京市委书记期间，缪瑞林任南京市市长。
description.en: While Wu Zhenglong was the Party Secretary of Nanjing, Miu Ruilin served as the Mayor of Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 在李强担任中共江苏省委书记期间，吴政隆任江苏省省长。
description.en: While Li Qiang was the Party Secretary of Jiangsu, Wu Zhenglong served as the Governor of Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 在娄勤俭担任中共江苏省委书记期间，吴政隆任江苏省省长。
description.en: While Lou Qinjian was the Party Secretary of Jiangsu, Wu Zhenglong served as the Governor of Jiangsu.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会
中国共产党江苏省委员会

description.zh-cn: 在吴政隆担任中共江苏省委书记期间，许昆林任江苏省省长。
description.en: While Wu Zhenglong was the Party Secretary of Jiangsu, Xu Kunlin served as the Governor of Jiangsu.

position.en: Secretary of the CPC Jiangsu Provincial Committee

description.zh-cn: 吴政隆担任中共江苏省委书记期间，向以习近平为总书记的党中央负责。
description.en: During his tenure as Secretary of the CPC Jiangsu Provincial Committee, Wu Zhenglong was subordinate to the Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as General Secretary.

relationships.target: 江苏省人民代表大会常务委员会
中国共产党第二十届中央委员会
中华人民共和国国务委员
中华人民共和国国务院秘书长

description.zh-cn: 在李强担任国务院总理期间，吴政隆任国务院秘书长，成为李强的“大管家”。
description.en: During Li Qiang's premiership, Wu Zhenglong serves as the Secretary-General of the State Council, effectively acting as Li Qiang's chief of staff.

description.zh-cn: 吴政隆接替落马的陈川平，出任中共太原市委书记。
description.en: Wu Zhenglong succeeded the disgraced Chen Chuanping as the Party Secretary of Taiyuan.

description.zh-cn: 吴政隆接替黄莉新，出任中共南京市委书记。
description.en: Wu Zhenglong succeeded Huang Lixin as the Party Secretary of Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 吴政隆被任命为江苏省代理省长，接替石泰峰。
description.en: Wu Zhenglong was appointed as the acting Governor of Jiangsu, succeeding Shi Taifeng.

description.zh-cn: 吴政隆升任中共江苏省委书记，接替娄勤俭。
description.en: Wu Zhenglong was promoted to the Party Secretary of Jiangsu, succeeding Lou Qinjian.

description.zh-cn: 信长星接替吴政隆，出任中共江苏省委书记。
description.en: Xin Changxing succeeded Wu Zhenglong as the Party Secretary of Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 吴政隆获任命为国务院秘书长，接替肖捷。
description.en: Wu Zhenglong was appointed as the Secretary-General of the State Council, succeeding Xiao Jie.
